title: UI Internationalization (i18n)
description:
Add JavaScript-based i18n to translate UI text into the user's selected language (English, Danish, Dutch). Uses Alpine.js store for instant language switching without page reload.

Plan: docs/plans/ui-i18n-plan.md

Scope:
- All UI text except app title and artwork titles/metadata
- Search bar text, buttons, examples, modals, error messages

Deferred:
- AI-generated descriptions (caching per language)
- Work type translations

Multilingual Search Support
description:
Add multilingual search support using LibreTranslate. Users select a language (English/Danish/Dutch) in the frontend; non-English queries are transparently translated to English before CLIP embedding. Graceful degradation if translation fails.

Detailed implementation plan: /home/kristian/.claude/plans/tender-crunching-stroustrup.md

title: Add LibreTranslate to Docker infrastructure
description: Add LibreTranslate service to docker-compose.dev.yml and docker-compose.prod.yml. Configure with LT_LOAD_ONLY=en,da,nl to reduce memory usage. Add healthcheck and internal network configuration for production.

title: Create translation service with graceful degradation
description: Create artsearch/src/services/translation_service.py with translate_to_english() function. Add config vars (libretranslate_url, translation_timeout, translation_enabled) to config.py. Implement 2-second timeout with fallback to original query on failure.

title: Integrate translation into search flow
description: Add language property to SearchParams in context_builders.py. Pass language to handle_search() in search_service.py. Translate non-English queries before CLIP embedding. Keep original query for object number detection.

title: Add frontend language selector
description: Add Alpine.js language selector component to navbar in base.html. Store selection in localStorage. Inject lang parameter into all HTMX requests via htmx:configRequest event listener in home.html.

title: Add tests for translation service
description: Create artsearch/tests/test_translation_service.py with unit tests: English passthrough, Danish/Dutch translation (mocked), timeout graceful degradation, connection error handling. Update view integration tests for language parameter.
